effect.sun_moon: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.

short_effect.sun_moon: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
